```py
# create x and y vectors
x = np.linspace(-2, 2, 100)
y = 2 * x + 1
plt.plot(x, y)
# [...] Add axes and styles 
```

```py
# create x and y vectors
x = np.linspace(-2, 2, 100)
y = 2 * x + 1
y1 = -0.5 * x + 3
plt.plot(x, y)
plt.plot(x, y1)
# [...] 
```

```py
# create x and y vectors
x = np.linspace(-2, 2, 100)
y = 2 * x + 1
y1 = 2 * x + 3

plt.plot(x, y)
plt.plot(x, y1)
# [...] Add axes, styles... 
```

```py
# create x and y vectors
x = np.linspace(-2, 2, 100)
y = 2 * x + 1
y1 = (4 * x + 2) / 2

plt.plot(x, y)
plt.plot(x, y1, alpha=0.3)
# [...] Add axes, styles... 
```
